Title: Mice, fleas and the plague -- How to prevent plague infection
Designer: Beijing New National Painting Research Society (北京新国画研究会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: This poster is part of a series with the title "Everybody joins the patriotic hygienic campaign to prevent epidemics， Thoroughly defeat the germ warfare of American imperialism, " (彻底打散美帝国主义的细菌战，人人都来参加爱国防疫运动). The slogan on the right-hand side (人人都来参加爱国防病卫生运动) has been cropped.The poster was published in August 1952. The first impression was from July of the same year.Mice, fleas, and the spread of the plague explained in pictures, as well as illustrations for prevention (and catching mice).
